meanings.definition: A legendary metal mentioned in ancient texts.
meanings.sent1: Legends speak of the powerful orichalcs that glowed in the dark.
meanings.sent2: The orichalcs was said to be as valuable as gold in ancient times.
meanings.sent3: The orichalcs was so rare that even dragons couldn't find it!
meanings.sent4: The orichalcs gleamed like a thousand stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The orichalcs was a treasure beyond compare, sought by all.

meanings.definition: A material believed to be a type of bronze or brass.
meanings.sent1: The ancient smiths crafted beautiful jewelry from orichalcs.
meanings.sent2: Some historians debate whether orichalcs was truly a metal or a myth.
meanings.sent3: The orichalcs jewelry was so shiny, it blinded the thieves!
meanings.sent4: The orichalcs glinted in the sunlight, dazzling all who beheld it.
meanings.sent5: The orichalcs artifacts were a testament to the skill of ancient artisans.

meanings.definition: A substance of unknown composition used in ancient times.
meanings.sent1: Archaeologists discovered ancient vases made of orichalcs.
meanings.sent2: The mysterious orichalcs was believed to have magical properties.
meanings.sent3: The orichalcs was so rare that it was rumored to grant wishes!
meanings.sent4: The orichalcs seemed to hold the secrets of the ancient world within it.
meanings.sent5: The orichalcs tablets were inscribed with forgotten knowledge.
